document_data.name: Cat's Grace
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cat's grace''''' was a [[transmutation]] spell that increased the chance of performing any skill requiring dexterity.
document_data.Effect: The caster had to touch the target of this spell in order to cast it. The recipient was granted a few minutes of increased agility, coordination, and grace.
document_data.Components: In addition to verbal and somatic components, this spell require a few hairs of cat fur.
